column1: * 1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien attends a military medical board examination
column2: and is sent to Great Haywood to recuperate.

column1: * 1933 - Father Christmas writes a Letters from Father Christmas to J.R.R. Tolkiens children.
* 1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien submits The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth for publication.
* 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes writing Letter to Rayner Heppenstall (1-2 December 1954).
* 1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Elizabeth Jennings.
* 1956 - The third episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings airs on the BBC Third Programme.
